duties_responsibilities.duty: Checks-in patients in a timely manner and ensures all Web Check-in procedures are followed.
Answers phone calls to the clinic, provides information, and refers questions to others as needed.
Verifies insurance in a timely and accurate manner.
Ensures the occupational client’s preference card is followed and occupational procedures are completed.
Reviews all patient paperwork to ensure completeness and insures collection of necessary insurance/demographic information.
Completes Daily Balance Checklist after each shift, ensuring all forms of payment are accounted for and documented.

education_certification.credential: 1 year of clinical experience in a patient care setting is preferred.
BLS certification within 30 days of start required.
Ability to work with multiple computer programs.
